You should leave her to grieve.
You can't blame yourself for this.
The statue required a lifeblossom to start up.
but our only one went missing,
so he used his life instead.
And if he didn't soulbind to the statue he wouldn't have been puppeteered by that angel.
If I hadn’t stolen the flower and run away, none of this would have happened.
I thought I could use it to save everyone.
but the flower was never strong enough to protect the forest.
All I did was kill him.
We all make our choices, so did your father.
We all make our choices, so did your father.
Of course he would do this.
I was too stupid to realize he would.
Vulpes' eyes stare blankly ahead, in stark contemplation.
You are very familar with that gaze.
The light of hope is fast excaping her irises, soon to be replaced by the unending flame of vengeance.
Perhaps you can bring her back before it is too late.
Vulpes, the hard road is forgiving yourself. Honor your father.
Vulpes, the hard road is forgiving yourself. Honor your father.
I can never make up for what I did but I can still do what I can for my home.
I'll set the lifebloom up, then bury my father.
The lifebloom will have enough energy to protect the forest until you fullfill your mission.
I know you can, you are way stronger than me.
After I'm done here, I'm going to seal the heart of the forest so I can further assist you at the church.
Now if it's alright, I would like a few minutes alone here.
I'll see you at the church.

Captain Lorenzo is leaned up against the wall.
Why are you looking at me like that?
Why didn't you help during the fight?
I see you are a fan of lumber aswell?
Why didn't you help during the fight?
You know what they say, 3's a crowd.
Relax. You had it completely under control.
If I joined in, we would just bump into each other while trying to dodge the razer root.
Besides, You and that fox princess work well together.
I see you are a fan of lumber aswell?
I see you still got some room to be a smart arse.
I'll take that one on the chin after what I saw.
If I joined in, we would just bump into each other while trying to dodge the razer root.
So yes, I was enjoying the scenery.
I'm glad I didn't strike you down.
My superiors sending me on this suicide mission, rubbed me particularly the wrong way.
So I believe I'll be extending this truce of ours for a little bit longer.
You have a base of operations?
Tell him the location of the church.
Tell him you do not wish to be allies.
Tell him the location of the church.
I suppose it's a strategic location.
Tell him you do not wish to be allies.
And here I was trying to convince myself of the prospect.
I suppose I should thank you for making the decision for me.
I will head back to the castle.
112 men is what I came with.
And now I return with none.
but the grandmaster will still hail me as a hero.
All because the objective was met.
What he doesn't know is that I will be coming for his head.
Oh, and before you go, I have something to tell you.
Before I came here, a frostblooded strike team was made to hunt down the remainder of the Lotus Warriors.
Yes, most of them were captured and taken to the mountain.
Some of them got away though.
The dark one with the braids was the subject of most of the frostblood knights. Apparently she gave them a real problem.
You look like your head is about to expload.
Last I heard she fled east, towards the docks.
That's all I have to say.
Now leave me be, I need to think.
Captain Lorenzo is silently in his thoughts.
"He who grew the first seed. King Vulpes."
